teammember.name: Samantha
teammember.title: Florest
teammember.bio: Samantha loves growing flowers. She knows just all there is to know about growing flowers.

teammember.name: Hugo
teammember.title: Tailor
teammember.bio: Hugo loves to sew. He can sew just about any two materials together and do so seamlessly.

teammember.name: Rawanda
teammember.title: Scientist
teammember.bio: Rawanda loves science. She especially likes test tubes and mixing things in test tubes.
